subject: Doping (Sports)
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Football
lead_paragraph: Robbie Gould kicked a 38-yard field goal with 11 minutes 28 seconds left in overtime Monday night, and Chicago defeated Green Bay and remained in the running for the playoffs.
snippet: Robbie Gould kicked a 38-yard field goal with 11 minutes 28 seconds left in overtime Monday night, and Chicago defeated Green Bay and remained in the running for the playoffs.
